actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress concerning the President's issuing a proclamation calling upon the several States and foreign nations to participate in the 1976 Pacific 21 Exhibition and Festival.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress concerning the 1976 Pacific 21 Exhibition and Festival. Directs the President to issue a proclamation calling upon the States and foreign nations of the Pacific to participate.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress concerning the President's issuing a proclamation calling upon the several States and foreign nations to participate in the 1976 Pacific 21 Exhibition and Festival.
